title: Welcome to Gameplay & Strategy!
body:
Hi Summoners,

Welcome to the Gameplay and Strategy board!  This is the place to discuss anything directly related to playing League of Legends. Anything from discussing your favourite champion, the best strategy to finish out a game, how to make sure you remember to actually use your Zhonya's Hourglass or even why Teemo's Blinding Dart is the best ability in the game - it all belongs here! 

Basically, if it's related to playing the game - this is the place to post it!  The same [Universal Rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) apply here, as on all other boards - but otherwise, let's talk League!

replies.body: Excuse me, there is no Game & Strategy in the Create a Discussion section.
This should be fixed now - are you still having this issue?
